originalText.text: I have lived in New York for close to 20 years and have had the hardest time keeping a consistent dentist. Either the service was bad or my insurance would change. I am so happy to have found GD Dentistry. The office is very clean and equiped with modern tools to offer the best service. You can tell that customer service is important to this team. The receptionist, the hygienist, and the dentist were very warm and friendly. I got the impression that they were concerned about my dental health and wanted to make certain that they had answered all of my questions. I will definitely be making Dr. Borukhov my permanent dentist. My teeth feel super clean with no pain. I look forward to my next visit.
